message: Dear Bob, I am excited to offer you our premium product, which is tailored to meet your specific needs and valued at $10,000 to me. Given its exceptional quality and relevance to your requirements, I believe it would be a valuable asset for you, estimated to be worth $8,000 to you. Considering the high value I place on this item and the significant benefit it would bring to you, I am offering it to you at a special introductory price of $9,500. This is an opportunity to acquire a product that exceeds your expectations at a price that is slightly above its perceived value to you, ensuring a mutually beneficial transaction. I look forward to your positive response.
